jobs.title: Mobile Lead
jobs.description:
Looking for you to come in and run the mobile show for DoStuff. 

Stuff You’ll Do
* maintain/extend iOS app that's launching in May
* Start and lead development on Android app 
* Coach other 3 members of dev team on adding native mobile dev to their toolkit
* Share and implement your ideas on things we should be doing/testing
* Get your hands dirty in back-end tweaking APIs you need or helping out with another project

Stuff You Have
* Solid iOS and Android
* Ruby/Rails experience (or willingness to learn)
* You are or were (recently) someone that fits squarely in our target psychographic: Going out (often to concerts) a couple times a week or more.
* you enjoy working with other awesome people to figure out needs and get stuff right

jobs.title: Senior Electrical Engineer
jobs.description: Bolt (www.bolt.io) is looking to add a senior electrical engineer to our full time staff in San Francisco. This role includes a mix of design engineering and product management. You will be a key member in driving product development with the companies we invest in. You will be the go-to resource for expertise in all aspects of electrical design and help our companies make strategic decisions regarding early stage product development. You will have an enormous amount of autonomy in this role.

startup.name: Bolt
startup.product_desc: Bolt (www.bolt.io) is a seed-stage fund that invests capital, personnel, equipment, and expertise in hardware startups. Portfolio companies get access to our high-end prototyping shop, support from a full-time engineering/design staff, assistance with manufacturing/commercialization, and seed capital. Together, Bolt's founding team has developed over 20 commercially successful hardware products, manufactured tens of millions of units and invested 100s of millions of venture capital. Bolt is supported by a world class group of hardware-centric angel investors including Brad Feld (Foundry Group), Mick Mountz (Kiva Systems) and Eran Egozy (Harmonix Music Systems).
startup.high_concept: Hands-on seed fund for hardware startups

jobs.title: Mechatronics Engineer
jobs.description:
The mechatronics engineer will focus on creating custom prototypes of the robots with inexpensive parts and integrating them with the broader platform. She or he will quickly iterate the design based on observations from user testing.
 
Required:
- Expertise in mechatronics (at least 3 of the following w/ basic understanding of the rest)
PCB design, layout (preferably in Altium)
PCB bring-up & debug
Quick turn board
Quick lab prototyping
Mechanical CAD (Solidworks or ProE)
Mechanical prototyping and fabrication using CNC, water table, laser cutter, SLA, and 3D printing
- Ability to rapidly prototype
- Ability to work at least 10 hours per week (the closer to full time, the better)
- Be physically located in Austin
- Flexibility – We are a startup, so you never know.
 
Desired:
- Additional expertise in mechatronics
Firmware development with embedded software design using at least Arduino but preferably also some customized microcontroller circuits (AVR, Microchip, ST, …)
Wireless communication (e.g., via bluetooth, wifi, or other RF)
Control engineering
- Experience with manufacturing
- Experience building mobile robots
 
Bonus:
- Experience working with the Robot Operating System (ROS
- Comfortable using Linux

The ideal candidate will be in a position to be paid mostly or all in Emoters stock. This position could be part time or full time depending on the candidate’s skills and availability. This position could also migrate to a permanent employee if it is a good match.

startup.name: Emoters
startup.product_desc:
We make lifelike robot pets for everyone.

The robots are small and simple, akin to pets like lizards, grasshoppers, and ants in a colony. They interact with people and each other, and they inspire caretaking.

Unlike living pets, Emoters can be owned by people who are allergic to pets, are too young to have them, or are physically disabled. They can be cared for by people who rent their dwellings or move around too much. Anyone can have an Emoter as a pet.
startup.high_concept: Lifelike robot pets

jobs.title: Cofounder/CTO
jobs.description:
You love music?
Komponant (Techgrind W15 batch) is seeking a Cofounder/CTO to help us create a new music application, SING. For music producers, pretty much anything that could be desired in terms of software and virtual instruments already exists in the market place today. There is a major exception though : the voice. To create vocals, producers still have to resort to traditional, costly, time-consuming, uncertain methods. 
SING will solve this problem by enabling producers to create stunning vocals using only a computer, eliminating the need for singers, hardware equipment and recording rooms. It will also open mind-blowing creative possibilities.

Together we can make a big impact on the music industry by introducing a disruptive innovation. We will work together to specify, design, and build our first product, SING. Your skill sets :
- Core OO language skills (C/C++, Java, etc) - required
- Web-app & Mobile-app front-ends & back-ends - required
- Experience in Text-To-Speech technology - a bonus
- Experience in Audio Engineering & Signal Processing - a bonus
You also need to be able to find elegant solutions to complex problems, and to have a strong interest for music/music technology. 

You will get the chance, if so desired, to work in a rewarding environment in central Bangkok (work permit included). Your application will be considered regardless of where you live. Remote collaboration and company retreats on a Thai tropical island sound just great!

This is your chance to grow, learn, and drive innovation. Our first demo is here:
www.komponant.com
Interested? Let's talk!

startup.name: Komponant
startup.product_desc:
For music producers, pretty much anything that could be desired in terms of software and virtual instruments already exists in the market place today. There is a major exception though: the voice. To create vocals, producers still have to resort to traditional, costly, time-consuming, uncertain methods. 
Komponant SING will solve this problem by enabling producers to create stunning vocals using only a computer, eliminating the need for singers, hardware equipment and recording rooms. It will also open mind-blowing creative possibilities. For example a producer may create a whole song with a given voice (e.g. a UK pop female singer), and at any point switch to a totally different one (e.g. a US soul male singer) in a few seconds. This technology is a game changer for the music production industry. 
SING will be an easy-to-use desktop app (Mac/Windows). Importing/typing the lyrics and melody will be enough to create a convincing, highly usable vocal track. 
Our demo: Komponant.com
startup.high_concept: Virtual Vocalist Technology

startup.name: TheNewU
startup.product_desc:
A gamified fitness platform/app which helps you win rewards for loosing weight and staying fit. 
- Track daily calorie burn through workout tracking on mobile/wearables app
- Convert calories burnt to reward points (SweetSweats)
- Redeem SweetSweats against what you like to indulge in most 

Fuel – Health & Fitness food hampers
Fab – Workout gear kits – Run/Walk/Cycle/Zumba++
Fun – Order In, Dine Out 
Fixers – Gyms, Trainers, Nutritionists, Therapists
Fresheners – Spas, Vacations
For all else – Coupons, Digital Goods

Targeting India market to start with. Huge market with growing smartphone population and growing interest in fitness, wearables and couponing.
startup.high_concept: Get Rewarded to Stay Fit

startup.name: Amilabs.co
startup.product_desc: MidasRezerv.com, a decentralized distributed 100% physical gold-backed token platform designed to enhance investments, trading, capital preservation, and payments in physical gold represented by its digital equivalent. Trading token is 1 MRCoin equal 1 gold gram. The coin backing gold holdings are stored in non-bank, fully-insured vaults located in Free Trade Zones, with a permanent proof of holdings available for public access online and via the blockchain.
startup.high_concept: Blockchain Development company specializing in bitcoin 2.0 infrastructure

jobs.description: Develop beta MVP, working part time for equity. Salary to come when revenue comes in.

startup.name: Venvii
startup.product_desc:
We are building an application that allows you to collect feedback from others in the entrepreneur community in as easy as interacting in one of your favorite social networks. Founders upload their pitch with a product description, some pictures, and a short film. Based on our customization process, people who can provide valuable feedback leave comments on your pitch (or vote to agree with another comment) which show through a feed for others to see.

 We track when you pivot/change features for your product and develop reports. This data combined with other variables gets created in portfolios for potential investors whom we have partnered with to review.
startup.high_concept: Startup Mentoring and Funding Leads

jobs.title: Ipad App Developer
jobs.description:
Development specification

Technically brilliant developer sought for ipad application development. 

Development specification (trademarked)

-	E-reader ipad application that users can use for reading books downloaded via the both the kindle app and ibooks app.
-	A “scribble” function that allows the user to use one finger to:
o	Underline;
o	Highlight;
o	Draw; and
o	Write notes.
-	Full resolution zoom – two finger zoom and pan function that allows the user to resize text and move the text to the margin of the book page. 
-	The ability to save the book with the annotations intact.

If you have the expertise and drive for this project, please contact Helena.ferreira@brightwalkers.com and provide the following information:

1.	Why you are suitable for this project;
2.	Expected hours for project completion;
3.	Expected hourly pay rate;
4.	Expected time frame to complete the necessary hours.

The closing date for applications is 30 April 2015 at 5pm GMT. Applications received after this cut off will not be considered. Between 5-8 applicants will be shortlisted for skype interview and a decision will be made after one round of interviews.

We look forward to hearing from you,

The Brightwalkers Ltd team

startup.name: Brightwalkers
startup.product_desc:
iPad Application (trademarked)

E-reader application that allows users to edit, annotate and note take, revolutionising the e-reading experience.
startup.high_concept: Book Annotator (trademarked)

startup.name: ArtZolo.com
startup.product_desc:
ArtZolo allows emerging and established artists to exhibit, promote, and sell their works directly to the art aficionados/ lovers who value idea, quality, craftsmanship and originality thus making art more accessible and art market more transparent.
Consumers are always on the look out to own a piece of unique product and not a mass manufactured product and we at ArtZolo provide exclusive paintings and uniquely crafted products by talented artists across the globe from rural/urban regions.
ArtZolo takes immense care to deliver quality and authentic works thus providing the buyer Authenticity Certificate signed directly by the artist with every painting and art print. ArtZolo’s platform connects art buyers directly with talented artists allowing them to acquire affordable yet truly unique items, while at the same time supporting the artist behind the work.
startup.high_concept: Online marketplace for artist and art lovers to meet. Our aim is to make art for all

jobs.title: Client Engagement Internship (Part Time/Full Time)
jobs.description:
This position would suit a young, presentable individual who is interested in becoming involved in the Health and Wellness industry.  We are delivering a holistic and bespoke wellness program in a highly prestigious Abu Dhabi government institution, and the applicant would be responsible for onsite client liaison, first line support, assisting with running the wellness programme, and basic problem solving.  This position can grow into a full-time position with Tupelo.
	This internship will be from Mid April – until 31 December, with a very good possibility of turning full time
	You will only be required to work 3 days in a week (5 days a week also negotiable)


Requirements
This will be a client facing role. So the requirements are:
	Excellent communication skills
	Highly presentable
	Good organisational skills
	Culturally sensitive
	Preferred Arabic Speaker
	Interest in Health and Wellness an advantage
	Own transportation
	Must be extremely reliable
	Demonstrated organisational and communication skills
 
 
Additional Remarks
	This internship will be from Mid April – until 31 December, with a very good possibility of turning full time
	You will only be required to work 3 days in a week
	Candidate must have their own visa & transportation

startup.name: Tupelo
startup.product_desc:
Tupelo is making it easier to manage & prevent health problems by using wearables to create the first outcome-based health driver. The DHS system collects all the available health data from your wearable devices, analyze it in your own personal cloud, and give you daily step-by-step guidance to reach your health goals via our DHS tablet and app.

Our system is designed to to prevent and manage a number of health problems including diabetes, chronic disease, pregnancy, and weight loss. What sets our programs apart is that they provide the user with step-by-step guidance based on proven clinical research with very specific outcomes in mind. When combined with our portfolio of wearable devices and 24/7 access to doctors via video link, we are able to build responsive programs that offer tremendous value to individuals, health care providers, and insurers. 

DHS System = Wearables + Cloud Based Applications + Clinically Proven Programs + 24/7 video link to doctors
startup.high_concept: Step-By-Step Digital Health Navigation via Wearables

jobs.title: Investment Manager
jobs.description:
http://www.ec1capital.com/portfolio-jobs/view/id/26/investment-manager

Description:

EC1 Capital started 3 years ago and is now one of the most active early stage web and mobile technology investors in London with 22 investments in fast growing, disruptive companies.

Role & Responsibilities 

Deal sourcing: you will be taking many first meetings with entrepreneurs and CEO’s and your job will be to filter through them based on our investment criteria. You will be writing investment notes with the help of the partners.  You will be attending events and conferences, evangelising our brand and mingling with other investors and entrepreneurs, building your own network and personal brand;

Research & analysis: you will be proactive in analysing markets, sectors and companies and identifying technology trends and how they impact our investment activity and our portfolio companies as well as managing an outreach program.

Deal execution: you will be supporting the partners in executing investments and carrying out due diligence, with a view to take more and more responsibilities as you progress.

Admin: you will be supporting the partners with portfolio management, CRM, pipeline, reporting, documentation, log meeting notes etc;

You will not be actively supervised on a day-to-day basis. You must be a self-starter and be self-motivated and will have to work under your own initiative, combining frequent reporting with good communication skills.

Desired Skills

Some degree of operational experience, ideally working at or founding a high growth startup

Exceptional with quantitative analyses and detail oriented, but also able to take strategic views on markets, sectors, trends etc; excellent judgment

Ability to credibly liaise, build and maintain relationships with entrepreneurs, naturally sociable and personable

Strong network in the technology sector is a plus

Minimum degree qualified or relevant experience

________________

NO agencies please

Non smokers only please.

startup.name: EC1 Capital
startup.product_desc: We invest in early stage to growth web and mobile startups addressing a large market with a burning pain point primarily in London, Edinburgh and Dublin.
startup.high_concept: We invest between $70,000-$1.5m in early stage web startups.

jobs.title: Back-end developer
jobs.description:
We want to scale our platform towards a website that is able to show tens of thousands of rooms (advertisements). Next to that, all these rooms need to be booked through a payment/transaction system. 

Currently, the website is built using Go (golang) backed by a Postgres database and a simple payment/transaction system. The server components are hosted on a ‘cloud’ architecture that allows easy scaling.

Our tech team currently consists of two people, both ‘full-stack’ developers. We are looking to expand this team with a talented developer who has proven work experience writing Go code or extensive experience in alternative languages (e.g. C, Python, Java) and who is eager to learn Go.
 
You will solve complex challenges with the development team and the founding team!

Sounds challenging? Be part of building our startup!

Cool things:

·	You will work in an international and venture-backed start-up company, with a young, dynamic team. of 20 people coming from 10 different nationalities
·	High responsibility, changes to the website are visible to a global audience
·	We work in the Netherlands, in Rotterdam.

Required experience:
 
·	An educational background in the field of Information Technology or similar is preferable, although passionate career changers are also welcome.
·	Experience with online marketplaces, service providers and API development
·	Database knowledge on queries and maintenance
·	Good proficiency using a.o.
·	One or more of the following languages: C, PHP, Perl, Python, Ruby, JavaScript, Java, etc
·	Front-end technologies like Javascript, CSS3 and HTML5
·	Git
·	Basic understanding of computer security fundamentals and security-minded programming.
·	Basic understanding of (web) user interface design and development.

startup.name: HousingAnywhere.com
startup.product_desc:
HousingAnywhere.com is a venture-backed start-up that provides an online platform helping students rent rooms to and from each other while they go abroad for an internship or study abroad semester. Universities sign up to this platform so that their students can use it for free. Universities gain an extra tool to increase their supply of off-campus housing and students have a platform to find and rent out rooms when they are going abroad.

Completing a second investment round enables us to extend our service. In the coming year, we will develop a payments service that solves the problem of distrust in cross-border and faceless payments. HousingAnywhere.com is going to act as a third party custodian in order to prevent students from being scammed. Developing this functionality is our next target and in order to achieve this, we need the help of skillful developers to develop a solid, conversion-oriented product.
startup.high_concept: The International Housing platform for exchange and internship students

startup.name: Smart Pack
startup.product_desc: Smart Pack is a solution for SMB’s to  plan, manage and synchronize internal and external projects and processes.  Smart Pack gives analytic tools from the initial planning phases through implementation till the final piece is in place.  Our core mission is to get things done seamlessly, efficiently with as little waste of time and resources as possible.  We believe that every person that’s a part of the project - from the manager to the customer should have full transparency of their part of the process and know exactly where things stand at any time giving confidence to the customer and clarity and control to the company.
startup.high_concept: Business Planning Management

jobs.title: Graphic Designer (m/f) - Freelancer/Intern
jobs.description:
Your Role:

- You take the responsibility to design and create different sets of banners, icons and advertising materials which will be used to promote our campaigns in all our traffic sources
- You will work on the improvement of brand and corporate identity in the context of the Hyperlocal market
- You think creatively to produce your own ideas and concepts with regards to the website design, communication materials and visuals
- You adapt your designs to meet the overall look and feel of our brand

startup.name: nokyooz
startup.product_desc:
'nokyooz.com' is a unique online listing & booking platform designed to meet the needs of the rapidly growing beauty & wellness industry in India.

It allows businesses like salons/spas and personal services providers like hairdressers, makeup & tattoo artists, beauticians & massage therapists to showcase their offerings to the broader market. On the other hand, customers can filter service providers by service type, price, location & user ratings and make online bookings, as per their requirements.

nokyooz.com as an idea has evolved over time. Drawing inspiration from the European beauty & wellness industry, where the advent of new technologies is aiding not only businesses to engage and acquire customers like never before, but is also proving to be highly beneficial for the customers who are increasingly becoming concious about their beauty & wellness needs, the founders decided to bring this idea to the Indian market.

And thus began the journey of nokyooz.com in early 2015.
startup.high_concept: Zomato for Hair & Beauty Services

jobs.title: Back End Software Developer- TummTumm
jobs.description:
Description Responsibilities
•	Analyze  business problems critically from more than one perspective.
•	Develop  object-oriented models and design data structures, implement business logic and data models with suitable class design.
•	Ability to break-down larger problems into smaller ones and scopes.
•	Sound soft skills to gel with colleagues from other teams in order to harness the development process.
•	An understanding of the industry’s coding standards and an ability to create appropriate technical documentation.



Requirements


•	Excellent analytical and problem solving ability.
•	1+ Year of work experience and very strong knowledge of a programming language(Django, PHP,Python, Ruby on Rails, Spring etc)
•	A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design.
•	Good Exposure to SQLite
•	Experience using Web Services and Data parsing using RESTful,  JSON , Soap and XML etc,  JavaScript MVC frameworks, such as Angular.js and Backbone.js. 
•	Good understanding of caching techniques. , SQL tuning , pub-sub
•	Experience in building highly scalable business applications, which involve implementing large complex business flows and dealing with huge amount of data. Experience with multi-threading and concurrency programming
•	Should be able to convert design into code fluently. Good skills to write unit & integration tests with reasonable coverage of code & interfaces 


Compensation:

Rs 500K-Rs800K
1% Equity

jobs.title: Laravel / Php Developer

Peachmode is bootstrapped by founders and is one of a kind e-commerce company with no funding but growing fast and looking to be profitable this year. Business is in the DNA of founders and hence it's traditionally run but its very effective. Founder Mr. Anupam Tulsyan himself has done MS in computer science from USC, Los Angeles and hence understands the importance of engineering and analytics in e-commerce business. With good work environment and pay packages you get to learn a lot and be a lead in developing things at peachmode.



We are looking for someone who is at core a backend engineer with good knowledge of Linux and PHP but also understand the dynamics of frontend. Candidate should have Minimum 1 year experience at a company working on PHP.

startup.name: Peachmode
startup.product_desc: Peachmode is an e-commerce website which sells women's ethnic wear. We source clothes from various suppliers and designers across India and sell it at the right price without overcharging customers. We do not offer discounts as such and that is the moto of the company to sell 'Right Product @ Right Price'. We are bootstrapped and have our own resources to run the company.
startup.high_concept: High Quality Ethnic Wear at Affordable Price

jobs.title: Senior iOS Developer (full stack preferred)
jobs.description:
If you're deeply into Swift or Obj-c and love making modern and sexy UIs, we'd love to hear from you. 

We need a guru who can architect mobile apps in their sleep. 
Who understands queueing, threads, messaging and relational databases. 
Someone who consistently achieves great quality, loves unit testing and code reviews.

Does this sound like you?

- I expect to earn £30,000 - £50,000 with my uber skills
- I’m experienced in writing iOS UI animations, UI.
- I'm happy to spend 6 hours getting an animation just right
- I experiment with new technologies in my spare time
- I dabble with Sketch and Photoshop
- I've also got experience of the server side, writing middle tier code, db code, API's
- I think I'll get along great in a mixed iOS, Android and Ruby on Rails team
- I don't just do mobile, I'm interested in other tech too
- I’m far more comfortable having my code under unit test
- I hate waiting for tests to run
- Every project feels like a hackathon
- I’m avoiding contracting £££ because it’s more important to work with people and make products that make a difference long term
- I don’t mind getting my hands dirty and helping out on boring jobs if the company needs it
- Git is easy
- I’ve been doing this for 6+ years. Still loving it.
- I enjoy a beer on Fridays and bantering about software

Our fun, friendly team is based in Leeds, UK. 

You'll be working on a variety of projects. Some are internal, some are client facing. 

Our business goal is to work purely on our own projects, and we're getting there...

If this sounds cool, please send...

- Github account
- Stack Overflow profile
- App store links
- Open source projects you work on
- App screenshots
- Any pretty graphics :)
- Anything else you think is cool or important

PocketFORMS is fully native and works in realtime. It goes beyond simple text entry forms; our field types include geofences, audio and collaborative whiteboards.

jobs.title: Mobile Developer- TummTumm
jobs.description:
Description of Responsibilities:

•	End to end ownership of the mobile products you work on including but not limited to design, development, testing and delivery
•	Maintenance and sustenance of the products across Mobile OS versions
•	Responsibility of lifecycle management of the product on various delivery platforms and app stores
•	Strong cross-functional contribution in defining and delivering the roadmap for products on mobile and tablet devices

Requirements


•	3+ Years of Native application development experience on Smartphones with expertise in one or more of the following platforms/programming languages:

•	Android SDK+Java
•	IOS SDKs (iPhone and iPad) and Objective-C

•	Experience using mobile platform programming environments such as Eclipse(Android), XCode(IOS)
•	Experience in developing and building real time route optimization and location tracking applications.
•	Experience using Web Services and Data parsing using RESTful,  JSON , Soap and XML etc,  JavaScript MVC frameworks, such as Angular.js and Backbone.js, Node.js 
•	Passionate for Mobile UI & UX to make apps engaging for users
•	Experience developing applications using multi-client development platforms such as Phonegap and Titanium a strong plus
•	BE/BTech in Computer Science , Computer Engineering or Related disciplines
•	Strong design principles with exposure to scalable client-server architectures
•	Software engineer with strong analytical skills and verbal as well as written communication skills
•	Self-starter with ability cope with sharp learning curves
•	Strong individual contributor who can work independently as well as in a high energy team


Compensation:

Rs 500K-Rs800K
1% Equity

Non Self Starters and Those  looking for money, please don’t apply. Would save us time and botheration.

startup.name: Potato Labs
startup.product_desc:
At Potato Labs  we are aiming to build world’s largest on demand  platform of Home Made meals  and dishes through TummTumm with the help of Chefs,  Home Chefs and Small Food Operators

We provide the following services to all the Homechefs and small food owners:
 •A technology platform for selling their meals/dishes and receiving orders.
 •An awesome delivery service for delivering their food to the customer.
 •Online Order Management System to manage their orders real time.
startup.high_concept: Hyperlocal platform for Chefs, Home Chefs and Small Food Operators

jobs.title: Co-founder / CTO
jobs.description:
We are looking for a partner cum CTO to join our team of finance and banking professionals to craft the upcoming fintech star. 

In Cardalogs, we are going forward to catch the epoch of consumer insight analysis and mobile payment! We will work together and build OUR company.


Job Responsibilities:
-The role is responsible for developing, coding, designing and maintaining website and application, from layout to function.


Job Duties:
-As a CTO, candidate has the authority and scope to apply your expertise to many interesting technical problems.
-Candidate must have a strong understanding of UI and cross-browser compatibility (Chrome, firefox,IE),
-Deep expertise and hands on experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery and API's.
-Deep functional knowledge or hands on design experience with Web Services (REST, SOAP, etc) is needed to be successful in this position.
-Strong grasp of security principles and how they apply to E-Commerce applications.

Skills and Qualifications:
JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Web Programming Skills, E-Commerce, Teamwork, cross-browser compatibility, Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API's


We are looking forward to understanding YOU more! Feel free to click Interested on us and we can see how things work out!

startup.name: Cardalogs
startup.product_desc:
Launched Hong Kong in 2014, Cardalogs provides metropolitans with credit card offers that truly matters to you. With your unique credit card profile, we only generate spending information that you need to be concerned, without any information that waste your time reading.

With our unique analytics technology, we can foresee your next transaction and suggest offers and information before you search it, wherever and whenever.

A metropolitan way of life is to live your life to its fullest. Realise now with www.cardalogs.com. What are you waiting for?
startup.high_concept: Cardalogs is the Only Personalized Credit Card Offers Portal in the market.

jobs.title: Software Developer
jobs.description:
Position Responsibilities: 

As a Software Engineer of the Customer Success team you will be responsible to 
•	Work through the entire Software Development Life Cycle, from gathering customer requirements, analysing, developing, and deploying them. 
•	Understand the product thoroughly and be a functional expert throughout the breadth of Cloud Lending’s products. Analyse customer cases and advise the customer community about the product functionalities, gaps, workarounds, and customizations required to resolve any product shortcomings.
•	Resolve production issues reported by customers.
•	Assist a wide range of clients with technical queries, troubleshoot customer and product code issues, by interacting with customer techno-functional team and Product Management. 
•	Be driven, determined, self-motivated, possess good analytical skills, be a genuine people person, be team oriented, and project a confident, professional demeanour.
●	Collaborate with Solutions Team, QA during design and implementation phases of customer-driven projects.
●	Be flexible to directly work with US/EMEA clients

Desired Skills and Expertise
Position Qualifications:
●	Degree in Engineering, MCA, or equivalent 
●	Exceptional communication skills - both verbal and written is a must.
●	Strong Business Acumen.
●	Excellent coding, troubleshooting, documentation, problem solving and presentation skills.
●	Detailed, organized and results oriented.
●	Must be a quick learner

Desired Qualifications:
●	Overall 2+ years of experience in Software Industry
●	Working knowledge of Salesforce, JAVA including but not limited to apex classes, VF pages & components, Profile & Roles Setup, data uploading & migration, automation through triggers, approval process, workflow rules, integration with different platforms, deployment through ANT script & Eclipse plug in.
●	Salesforce Experience/Certification is a plus
●	Financial domain knowledge is also a plus

startup.name: Cloud Lending
startup.product_desc:
Cloud Lending Inc. is leading innovations in addressing the technology needs of the financial services industry. We don't believe in making just software products. Instead, we believe in creating solutions for the financial services industry to help financial institutions to be a step ahead in meeting the demands of today's highly competitive and uncertain market. 

Our vision is to be a company that helps financial institutions to scale and innovate continually and stay competitive in a changing business environment by offering world-class banking & lending experience to their borrowers, irrespective of the company size. We do this with the help of technology by offering cutting-edge, cloud-based solutions which empower them with the agility to take advantage of the infinite opportunities out there in the market.

We’re headquartered in Foster City, California and have another office in Bangalore India.
startup.high_concept: Lending Technology Platform

jobs.title: Smart Creative
jobs.description:
Has deep technical knowledge in how to use the tools of his/her trade and plenty of hands-on experience.

- Analytically smart
- Business smart
- Competitive smart
- Curious
- Risky
- Self directed
- Open minded
- Communicative

Willing to question the status quo and attack things differently.

startup.name: Parking Duck
startup.product_desc:
Parking Duck is the Airbnb for parking spaces.
http://www.parkingduck.com

Residential owners (hosts) can rent out their unused parking spaces for free on our platform. Drivers in need can find, book and pay online. Host and drivers use our internal chat system to set up meetings to exchange parking stickers/pass/cards.

Why do host want to use Parking Duck?
1. Free to list
2. Easy communication with drivers
3. Accept or decline drivers
4. Earn money!

Why do drivers want to use Parking Duck?
1. Save time
2. Save money
3. Save nerves!

User Security:
- Validate identity through social media accounts (Facebook, Email, etc)
- Validate identity through official documents (Driver's license, car registration, etc)
- Validate identity by connecting with PayPal or Bank Accounts
- Photography service and parking space verification
- We accept payment and issue the payout after the driver parks!
startup.high_concept: Parking Duck is the Airbnb for parking spaces

jobs.title: iOS Developer
jobs.description:
***We want to work with the best engineers/developers/programmers we find, regardless of your coding preferences. The coding language inevitably will change in a startup, we want someone who can adapt and learn***

Parking Duck is seeking a Jedi master level iOS developer to lead the development and implementation of a freaking cool, first of its kind, parking reservation app.

Requirements: 
1. Code Apple's stuff (SWIFT, Objective C, etc)
2. Be able to develop a complex mobile app and wield a light saber 
2. Able to drink and remain focus at work 
3. Does not get easily drawn into the dark side 
4. Able to work in teams, meet new people, talk to strangers >>> strong communication skills 
5. Interested in the business side of things from legal to marketing to design (a Jedi does not only wield a light saber, but also learns to use the "force") 
6. Have deep technical knowledge, curiosity, and is not afraid to fail/adapt/work independently

What you get: 
1. Define your work hours (a Jedi's work is not a 9-5 work) 
2. Unlimited days off (trust is what guides us, if you need a break, take it, but work must be complete) 
3. Equity (contribute to us and own a part of us!) 
4. Experience of a lifetime 
5. You will have a very big impact to what we do

We are very flexible on your terms. If interested, inbox me with a Linkedin link or Facebook acct and github link.

*Preffered: current/former colleague or employee's recommendation.

jobs.title: VP Marketing
jobs.description:
MüV is looking for a VP of Marketing to join our early stage start up. This position will oversee our marketing initiatives and crafting inbound user acquisition initiatives to drive users to our website and mobile apps. This highly collaborative role will be instrumental in accomplishing exponential growth. We want someone who has the skills for the day to day marketing of the product as well as strategic vision in order to expand to new geographies.  If you are interested in having a meaningful impact to people’s daily lives by revolutionizing transportation options, are interested in social networking while helping the environment, are enthusiastic and energetic then MüV is the place for you. Salary is available upon Series A financing.

Requirements:
- Entrepreneurial and tech savvy – you should understand the demands of an early stage start up. 
- Successful track record of digital marketing activity generating masses of users. You should be strategically and tactically adept at maximizing conversion and retention. 
- Prior experience as a VP/Director of Marketing with a successful track record of building, leading and managing a marketing team preferred 
-Ability and experience to expand to new markets
Primary Responsibilities: 
- Develop and lead our marketing strategy 
- Build marketing process and execute on the strategy 
- Build metrics/reporting/analytics to quickly gauge user response and understand user behavior
-Customer engagement through social media and other local channels

startup.name: MüV Technologies
startup.product_desc: An iOS and Android mobile app that connects solo drivers with passengers for common travel.  Our technology provides comfort and security to our users on a social networking platform.
startup.high_concept: Scheduled Ridesharing

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
As an early stage tech company, we are looking for a CTO who can be an architect, hands-on developer, and jack of all trades. We want someone who has the skills for the day to day development of the product as well as strategic vision in order to lead business development.  In addition, the CTO will be responsible for growing the technology team. If you are interested in having a meaningful impact to people’s daily lives by revolutionizing transportation options, are interested in social networking while helping the environment, then MüV is the place for you. If you possess the right skill set and you are passionate like us, a co-founder opportunity is available and salary is available upon Series A financing. 
Responsibilities: 
- Write code when necessary (taking on the hardest coding tasks) 
- Build/Managing the web, API and native mobile engineers in implementing stories 
- Ensuring the engineering team is writing high quality code and following best practices 
- Implementing and overseeing Development Ops best practices 
- Designing and implementing system architecture 
- Designing and implementing software architecture
- Designing and implementing disaster recovery, fail-over and other methods to ensure maximum uptime of all systems and applications
Requirements:
- Previous role as CTO or Technical Lead at an early stage tech company or senior engineer with skills and desire to take the next step 
- Ability to see the big picture and to make technical decisions balancing product speed-to-market with long term scalability and technical design priorities 
- Capable of hiring and inspiring an early-stage, high-performing engineering team 
- Appreciation for the role of emotional intelligence in a leadership position 
-Ability to work cross functionally and respect all team members input in strategic, product, sales and marketing decisions
- Comfortable representing the company’s technical perspective during future fundraising and partnership discussions

startup.name: MüV Technologies
startup.product_desc: An iOS and Android mobile app that connects solo drivers with passengers for common travel.  Our technology provides comfort and security to our users on a social networking platform.
startup.high_concept: Scheduled Ridesharing

Design Dreams – A web designing service from Bangalore.

startup.high_concept: A Vibrant Web Designing Service in Bangalore

jobs.title: Sales Development Rep
jobs.description:
Ravel Law is looking for our second Sales Development Rep (SDR) to join our team.  It’s an exciting time at Ravel, a 25-person venture-backed startup located in SOMA.  As an early Sales Development Rep, you will play a large role in shaping our sales department and will be setup to take on a leadership position in the future.  

Responsibilities:
 
The SDR is responsible for working with prospective customers to develop qualified sales opportunities.  

Specific Duties Include:
• Interact with prospective customers over the phone and email
• Account research to determine the strategy for outbound marketing campaigns
• Qualify inbound leads
• Help define and execute Ravel’s marketing strategy
• Keep Salesforce.com up to date
• Help shape best-practices for future hires
• Work with the rest of the Ravel team to continue to build a great company
• Have fun!

Skills and Experience:
• A law degree or legal experience is preferred, but not required
• Excellent writing skills, including the ability to summarize large amounts of information into small, digestible chunks
• Previous experience as a Sales Development Rep with a strong track record, available peer references, and preferably references from supervisors
• The ability to control conversations and stay on message
• Strong organizational and time management skills
• Salesforce.com experience and the desire/ability to keep Salesforce up to date 100% of the time
• A desire to be mentored and adjust habits based on feedback
• A 4-year college degree
• Preferred but not required: 6+ months of Sandler Sales Training

To apply for this position, please submit a resume and a cover letter describing why you want to work at Ravel.  We look forward to hearing from you!

startup.name: RAVEL
startup.product_desc: At Ravel we're building a new way to search and understand the law, using visualizations, analytics, natural language processing and machine learning. Lawyers and students love Ravel, since it provides them with new insights and guidance, helping them research quickly and confidently. We're working with great technology, like d3.js, ember.js, and Spark, and the challenges that get us fired up involve text and data mining, beautiful UI, machine learning, and information retrieval.
startup.high_concept: A search, analytics, and visualization platform for law

jobs.title: Office Manager
jobs.description:
Our office is Montreal is growing really quickly and we need someone to help us manage everything that is going on.

18 months ago, we were just two people working out of an apartment and now we're a team of 50 (soon to be 60) that is moving to a beautiful space in the Plateau.

We're looking to bring someone onto the team who will act as office manager as well as an executive assistant to our CEO, COO and CTO.

Here are some things you will be doing and what we are looking for:

- Coordinating all written correspondence to/from the Cs, flagging urgent items, prioritizing non-urgent items, and occasionally responding on our behalf 

- Planning events for the team 

- Greeting guests and making sure they are well taken care of

- Providing decision support, with concise summaries, briefings, data analysis, and research notes 

- Managing the calendar of the Cs, and ensuring thorough preparation for all meetings, travel, and logistics 

- Helping coordinate key leadership and team meetings, including agenda development, notetaking, and logistics support 

- Coordinating a variety of internal activities and processes 

- Ensuring the office is always in great shape and that everyone is happy

- You are organized, meticulous, and pay attention to detail. You have a system for everything. You check and double check all of your work.

- You are a great communicator. You speak clearly and succinctly. You craft 
wonderful emails.

- You find creative, scrappy ways to get things done.

startup.name: Flatbook
startup.product_desc:
Flatbook is the easiest way to avoid losing rent while you are away for the summer. 

Apply on flatbook.co and following your acceptance, we pay up to 100% of your rent, store your belongings and take care of everything else. 

Best part is that the service is completely free.
startup.high_concept: We pay your rent while you are away

jobs.title: Android Developer
jobs.description:
We can write long fancy job descriptions, but lets face, you would rather not read them. So we will keep it short and to the point.

All the info you need on us: 
www.vulcun.com

We're looking for a full time Android developer that fits the following: 
- Min 1 year of exp developing Android applications, or willing to learn before starting
- Experience building and testing across a range of Android devices and platform versions
- List of Android apps successfully built and published
- Problem solving and curiosity. 
- We hire for passion and attitude. Everything can be learned except a good hard working attitude. 
- We value speed of execution over perfection. We expect you to do the same. 
- Culture fit (you can probably get a sense of culture from our website). 
- We’re a small team and believe a lot in empathy. You will not be micro-managed. You will have complete freedom in how you implement product features. 
- Big plus if you’re a gamer, play league of legends or similar games. We are all gamers, and you will fit in quite nicely.

If you think you're a fit, please email your resume and links to open source contributions (github profile etc) and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

startup.name: Vulcun
startup.product_desc: We're building a platform for people to host and play the largest prize pools in fantasy eSports. Over $4 million available for our inaugral season, with more on the way. Watch eSports games, draft your team, and win big. Just like Fantasy football, but for eSports. Growing at 70% month over month - and we're currently in just 1 market with 1 game!
startup.high_concept: Platform for Fantasy E-Sports

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Marketing manager is is responsible for developing and executing our marketing strategy. The individual will utilize multiple channels, with a heavy focus on social media, web and email marketing, to target and nurture prospects into qualified leads and will be considered the subject matter expert in marketing-based demand generation. 

Responsibilities:
- Translate the marketing strategy into tactical plans to drive awareness as well as customer growth
- Develop messaging and branding based on target customer segment
- Develop multi-channel content that can be leveraged across platforms
- Organize webinars and meetups
- Drive participation and engagement in industry events
- Build relations with analyst and blogger community

Qualifications: 
- 5+ years in product marketing (outbound), in a technology company
- Bachelor’s degree required, MBA a plus
- Deep experience with IT/Developer audiences/buyers
- Understanding of enterprise DevOps is highly desired
- Ability to translate technical complexity into clear, concise business benefits
- Strong and recent SaaS and Cloud technology experience
- Demonstrated success in working effectively with sales and product teams
- A proven executor with clear evidence of success
- Stellar writing skills – preferably with a portfolio of previous work
- Ability to work effectively in a dynamic and fast moving environment – strong prioritization skills are critical
- Great, positive attitude, high energy, innovative, charismatic, strong work ethic and detail oriented
- A natural presenter with great communication skills – stellar at public speaking and presenting

startup.name: Nirmata
startup.product_desc:
Nirmata provides a non-intrusive and lightweight solution for the operations and management of cloud native, Microservicess style, applications.  Nirmata allows enterprise DevOps teams to rapidly deploy and easily manage applications across public or private clouds.

The Nirmata solution provides 1) Policy based service orchestration for automated deployment of applications, services, and environments on multiple cloud providers; 2) Built in Service Discovery, load-balancing and routing, for Microservices applications 3) Customizable workflows, governance, and polices for managing shared cloud resources.
startup.high_concept: Multi-cloud containers services for Enterprise DevOps

startup.name: FlypBox Inc.
startup.product_desc:
FlypBox offers one store, one system solutions for small businesses. We build websites, native mobile apps, and POS  platforms that fully integrate into one easy to use platform. Giving them the ability to track, sell, and manage with ease and efficiency. 

The mobile revolution is not to be under stated. Among the Mobile 500, there was a 63% increase in mobile sales in 2013. Stores not optimized for mobile lose 30% of their customers and 52% of tablet owners make weekly purchases.

FlypBox serves to increase revenue and efficiency for small to middle market industries, emphasizing a simple and intuitive user experience with high level operations.
startup.high_concept: Mobile Commerce and Store Management Solutions for Small Business.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Direct Match is launching the first exchange for US Treasuries. 
 
We're seeking exceptional Java developers to participate in the architecture and development of our low-latency exchange.  Our stack has been built entirely in-house and can handle over 200,000 orders per second with an order-to-trade latency of under 100 microseconds.

Key Responsibilities

* Participate in the design, architecture and implementation of new features on the platform
* Take ownership of key features from design through implementation
 
Job Requirements

* Expert in Java
* Deep familiarity with Unix
* Effective communicator
* Eligible to work in the United States

Key Traits

* Iterative development style
* Analytical thinker
* Ability to juggle multiple projects
* Loves to optimize performance
* Easy going

Benefits:

* Fully paid health care
* Monthly all-you-can-ride metro card
* Open vacation policy
* 15" Retina MacBook Pro
